mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ONLINE_DONATION(ONLINE_DONATION_NAME, ONLINE_DONATION_TEL, ONLINE_DONATION_ADDR, ONLINE_DONATION_ADDR_DETAIL, ONLINE_MATERIAL_LEATHER, ONLINE_MATERIAL_DENIM, ONLINE_MATERIAL_COTTON, KEYRING_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER) VALUE (SEQ_ONLINE_DONATION.nextval,#{onlineDonationName}, #{onlineDonationTel}, #{onlineDonationAddr}, #{onlineDonationAddrDetail},#{onlineMaterialLeather}, #{onlineMaterialDenim}, #{onlineMaterialCotton});
